name: GamesHub - Offline Games
info: Download and enjoy 100s of offline and online Games for free.

name: Archery Champs
info: Here is the most fun online archery game for you! Play against thousands of online players 1 on 1. Choose from multiple bows, arrows, and sights as you

name: Guess The Word
info: Two little aliens have crashed on planet Earth and no idea how to communicate in this fun word guess quiz! Help them learn words by finding the correct answers to the images. Fill in the letters, solve a level to earn coins and unlock more categories. Can you guess all word correctly and finish the quest?

name: Knife Rain
info: Cut It! is the perfect puzzle game for everyone who likes to give their brain a workout! Use your logical skills and cut the wood into pieces of equal size. Master all levels and collect all the stars!

name: Find Difference
info: Look at the two photos which seem identical and try to find the 5 differences!

name: 4 in a Row
info: Connect four same-colored discs next to each other in a vertical, horizontal or diagonal line in this fun version of the favorite game classic!

name: Tower Twist
info: Navigate the gaps as your fall through this helix tower labyrinth – time’s limited, let’s see how much you can score!

name: Skill Shot
info: Blast from barrel to barrel avoiding the yellow critters, reach as high as you can.

name: Knife Flip
info: You have to make the Knife flip from pillar to post! The objective of the game is simple: don’t fall down.

name: Kingdom Fight
info: Monsters are coming in. Use arrows, electric bolts, fire catapults, and time warpers – build a defense for your kingdom. New maps every day!

name: Box Crush
info: Clear rows and columns before the numbers get to zero. Keep an eye on the progress bar to unlock special power ups!

name: Spinning Shooter
info: Test your marksmanship by shooting down boxes that come your way. Beware of surprises!

name: Bowling Stars
info: Enjoy the best Bowling game online. Let’s see how many pins you can knock down!

name: Bubble Wipeout
info: Shoot down as many bubbles as you can – aim, match, shoot and burst the same colored bubbles. There is a timer to watch out for!

name: Smarty Bubbles
info: Combine at least 3  bubbles of the same color and try to get rid of them all!

name: Get The Weight
info: Guess the weight of the object shown and add the respective counterweight to the scale. Try to be as precise as possible and complete all levels with 3 stars in this fun measurement puzzle!

name: Robbers Town
info: Once upon a time, there are two robbers, they always stay together, tonight they decide to rob in a town. Help them jump to avoid obstacles on their road. There are many levels, can you pass all of them? Have a try, don't be caught by others!

name: Neon Ball 3d
info: Neon Ball 3d is a 3D online ball running game. This is a dangerous place, this ball wants to escape from the hell, but it needs some help because it needs change it's direction. See how far you can go. Good luck!

name: Kunai Throw
info: A knife is not just a weapon, sometimes we can use it to kill time. Kunai Throw is such a game. In this game we need to throw knives and hit rotating woods. The wood will rotate faster and faster. Try to follow the speed!

name: Dots Pong
info: Dots Pong is a pure color Ping Pong game, it only has white and black color. You need to play Ping Pong use these two colors. When ball's color is the same with dots on two sides, it will bounce, or you will lose.

name: T-Rex Runner
info: The T-Rex has to run, but you must get rid of many traps, such as cacti and pterodactyls. T-Rex Runner is a game based on another famous and very entertaining. But the T-Rex Runner is different, with excellent graphics and two color options. A black and white option, as the original game. And another color option, with amazing color. Enjoy!

name: Light Rays
info: Light Rays is a 3D physics puzzle game. Your aim in this game is to create mirrors, direct light rays, hit the target and win the game. There are 10 levels you can challenge, try to pass all of them and be a smart guy!

name: Snake Attack
info: Snake Attack is a HTML5 survival game. Eat all the yummy fruits and become the biggest snake! But watch out for the pesky snakes that will chase you to kill you!

name: Fizz Puzzle
info: FIZZ Puzzle is an addicting physical puzzle game. Your aim in this game is make this little ball fall into the end point. There will be many obstacles on your road and you can solve these problems using your physics knowledge. How many levels can you get? Have a try!

name: Darkness
info: He Likes The Darkness is an addicting adventure game, there are 100 levels waiting for you. The little monster in our game likes darkness very much, you need to help him stay in the dark. In every level you need to collect enough stars to open the door and get into the door. Can you pass all the levels? Have a try!

name: Dunk Line
info: Dunk Line is a basketball, drawing puzzle game, you need to draw a line to make the basketball fall into the basket. Think about the road before you draw or you will lose. You have only a few seconds to react, hurry up!

name: Fast Jump
info: Juice Bottle - Fast Jumps is a fast-paced online arcade game, you need to click your mouse or tap your screen when there comes a cones. The speed of it is random, so you need to really concentrate on the screen to success. See how many score you can get. Have fun!

name: Biggy Race
info: Drive a monster car on the rugged road, is that sounds crazy and exciting? In this driving game Biggy Race, you can show your skill and talent. Drive your great car, collect money and stars and buy new cars. Can you be the best driver in this world? Have a try!

name: Right Box
info: Right Box is an interesting highscore game need your reaction and judgement,in this game you need to tap screen or your mouse to increase your box and make it can stay on the platform. How many scores can you get? Have a try and create a new score!

name: Block Shooter
info: Help your airplane shoot blocks in front of you, don't touch these blocks or you will lose.

name: Circuit Drifter
info: Circuit Drifter is a html5 car driving game. Help the car turn corners is the only thing you need to do. But this job is so difficult, you need to practice some time to do it well. Don't give up! Keep trying!

name: Line Bright
info: Linebright is a HTML5 game， it's beautiful and logic, you need to use your brain to solve many problems about electric and physics. In this game you need to solve puzzle, avoid obstacles and collect crystal to complete. Have fun!

name: Target
info: Target is a physics puzzle game, you need to shoot your target after a series of bounce. There are many obstacles on you road, so your bomb can't reach the target directly, you need to use your physics knowledge to solve these problems. Can you pass all these levels? Have fun!

name: Blue Bird
info: Blue Bird is an addicting arcade game. In this game you need to tap the screen to change the blue bird direction and try not to collide with anything and collect the coins. How far can you go? Let's see that!

name: Cube Jump
info: Cube Jump is a colorful and beautiful jumping arcade game. You are trapped in the deep sky and the only way you can go home is jumping through this moving block path. It's dangerous, I know, but I believe you are brave enough to overcome the difficulties. Good luck, my hero!

name: Drop Me
info: This is an addicting one-touch color matching skill game. Tap to rotate the circles so that the dropping ball collide with the right circle. With a simple but unique game play, this game is great reflex challenger.

name: Retro Speed
info: The cute and interesting car racing game Retro Speed is back! In this game, you need to control your retro car and race with others. Keep your speed and avoid obstacles, if you crash into other cars, you will lose. See how many score you can get. Have fun!

name: Color Tower
info: Color Tower is a beautiful and interesting arcade game, you just need to click the screen to play this game. Your aim is build a tower as high as you can and try to get a good score.

name: Falling Bottle
info: Falling Bottle Challenge is an interesting online highscore game, but it's also suitable for mobile phone, in this game you need to make the bottle fall down to the ground, there will be many obstacles on your road, avoid them and see how many points you can get. Have fun!

name: Bounce
info: Hop, jump, and bounce over obstacles and collect the purple star boxes in each level of this game.

name: Jumpy
info: Dodge all the random spikes that get in your way to become the best jumper known to early men!

name: Switch Dash
info: Switch Dash is a fast-paced arcade game, it's both suitable for computer and mobile. In this game you need to switch the color of the platform to make it match with the ball falling down from sky. It's difficult, keep trying and get a good score. Enjoy!

name: Spikes Move
info: Here’s a cute bunny rabbit running about in an endless tunnel. Save her from those pointy spikes, will you?

name: Battle Fish
info: Grow fish to convert monsters into friends! Addictive arcade game with funny sea creatures.
